prodNameC: 亞培設計師 i 苯基巴比妥檢驗試劑組
ingredientsDesc: ABBOTT ARCHITECT iPhenobarbital Calibrators\n6 Bottles (4 mL each) of ARCHITECT iPhenobarbital Calibrators. The calibrators yield the following concentrations：0.0, 5.0, 10.0, 20.0, 40.0, 80.0 mg/L.

ABBOTT ARCHITECT iPhenobarbital Reagent Kit (100 Tests)\nMicroparticles：1 Bottle (6.6 mL) Anti-phenobarbital coated goat anti-mouse microparticles in TRIS buffer with protein stabilizer.\nConjugate：1 Bottle (5.9 mL) Phenobarbital acridinium-labeled conjugate in MES buffer with surfactant.
